headline: Netflix Stock Has A January Superpower — And The Numbers Prove It
summary: Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) has developed a striking seasonal pattern that traders have come to recognize: January has historically been its strongest month of the year, and by a wide margin. Over the past two decades, Netflix shares have posted an average January gain of 14.7%, finishing the month higher in 71% of years.
